page: PH60204: Physics And Technology Of Lasers

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Spontaneous and stimulated emission or radiation. Basic physics of lasing. Practical examples of lasers: gas, ion, vapour, dye, excimer, and semiconductor lasers. Applications in: science, industry, medicine, communications, defense, printing etc.
page: PH60204: Physics And Technology Of Lasers
